# HKMetadataKeyAverageMETs

**Global Variable**

A key that indicates the average Metabolic Equivalent of Task (METs) during a workout.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyAverageMETs: String
```

## Discussion

Set this key on a workout. Set its value to an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] object with a METs unit (for example, kcal/(kg*hr)). For more information on creating complex units, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit].

The value represents the average intensity over the entire workout’s duration.

## Intensity

- **HKMetadataKeyPhysicalEffortEstimationType**
title: HKMetadataKeyAverageMETs
